text: Allah woh hai jiss ney aasmanon ko baghair sutonon kay buland ker rakha hai kay tum ussay dekh rahey ho. Phir woh arsh per qarar pakray huye hai ussi ney sooraj aur chand ko ma-tehati mein laga rakha hai. Her aik miyad-e-moyyen per gasht ker raha hai wohi kaam ki tadbeer kerta hai woh apney nishanaat khol khol ker biyan ker raha hai kay tum apney rab ki mulaqat ka yaqeen kerlo
